comment.author: 34353497@N08
comment._content:
"Nordkap", in modern Norwegian "Nordkapp", known in English as "North Cape". One tells tourists this is Europe's northernmost point, but that's not really true- it's the furthest north you can drive a car, though...

"Opstigning" means something like "Ascending" - best translated as "The way up to North Cape" - assuming they got there by boat and had to walk/climb all the way up.
